content.sentence: #I am writing to express my extreme dissatisfaction
with my recent holiday at your resort.
I saw your advertisement in my Sunday paper
and read that your resort was ideal for holidaymakers of all ages.
I am 82 years old and hoped this would be the place for me.
It wasn't. I am used to going to bed at nine o'clock
and sleeping eight hours a night.
My room overlooked the beach disco
which played the monotonous beat of the terrible music
that is popular with the young today,
I was also unable to have my afternoon nap
due to the screams from the swimming pool.
I expect a full refund and I think you should know
that my son is the editor of a respected local newspaper.
